title: Hand Crossbows
content:
Hand Crossbows in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Hand Crossbows are Light Martial Ranged Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed, dealing 1-6 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 15m, and they deal Piercing Damage, with the exception of the Ne'er Misser that has a damage type of Force instead. Being a Ranged Weapon, note that you have disadvantage on attack rolls with Hand Crossbows while Threatened.

Many Hand Crossbows have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Hand Crossbows in BG3. These Weapon Actions include Piercing Shot and Mobile Shot.
